pullRequest.title: [BC-376] Support snappy over gossip
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Add support for snappy compression over gossip.
Also:

Fixed some ssz serialization issues:

Consider extra bytes to be an error
Decode plain boolean and Boolean types
Throw explicit error if reflection information is missing
Throw error if primitive type cannot be explicitly decoded

commit.message: Rework Compressor API for use with gossip
Make SimpleOffsetSerializer more robust / stricter, add tests
Use new GossipEncoder's when handling gossip
Update integration tests to run across different gossip encodings

Merge branch 'master' into bc-376/support-snappy-over-gossip

Reconcile filename changes
Add more roundtrip encoding tests for relevant gossip datastructures

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't we be doing this check in all cases? ie even if we don't know what the expected uncompressed size is, we should check that we actually read all bytes from the gossip message.

commit.message:
Revert "Rework Compressor API for use with gossip"

This reverts commit f0bcb615f8188e2b7f5aba84f048a4108014b0f0.

Use distinct compression strategies for gossip vs rpc requests

Gossip compression uses snappy block format, rpc request use the snappy
framed format.
